description: Session behavior analysis, bounce rates, and engagement patterns

groupby:
CASE
  WHEN session_duration_ms < 60000 THEN '< 1 min'
  WHEN session_duration_ms < 300000 THEN '1-5 min'
  WHEN session_duration_ms < 900000 THEN '5-15 min'
  WHEN session_duration_ms < 1800000 THEN '15-30 min'
  ELSE '> 30 min'
END

query_context.sql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN session_duration_ms < 60000 THEN '< 1 min'
    WHEN session_duration_ms < 300000 THEN '1-5 min'
    WHEN session_duration_ms < 900000 THEN '5-15 min'
    WHEN session_duration_ms < 1800000 THEN '15-30 min'
    ELSE '> 30 min'
  END as duration_bucket,
  COUNT(*) as session_count,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) as percentage
FROM session_metrics
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY MIN(session_duration_ms)

charts.description: Distribution of sessions by action count

groupby:
CASE
  WHEN actions_count = 1 THEN '1 action (Bounce)'
  WHEN actions_count BETWEEN 2 AND 3 THEN '2-3 actions'
  WHEN actions_count BETWEEN 4 AND 10 THEN '4-10 actions'
  ELSE '> 10 actions'
END

query_context.sql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN actions_count = 1 THEN '1 action (Bounce)'
    WHEN actions_count BETWEEN 2 AND 3 THEN '2-3 actions'
    WHEN actions_count BETWEEN 4 AND 10 THEN '4-10 actions'
    ELSE '> 10 actions'
  END as action_bucket,
  COUNT(*) as session_count
FROM session_metrics
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY MIN(actions_count)

SELECT
  dimension_value as device_type,
  AVG(bounce_rate) as avg_bounce_rate,
  SUM(total_sessions) as total_sessions,
  SUM(bounced_sessions) as bounced_sessions
FROM bounce_rates
WHERE dimension_name = 'device_type'
GROUP BY dimension_value
ORDER BY avg_bounce_rate DESC

SELECT AVG(bounce_rate) as overall_bounce_rate
FROM bounce_rates
WHERE dimension_name IS NULL
  AND metric_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'

SELECT
  metric_date,
  bounce_rate,
  total_sessions,
  bounced_sessions
FROM bounce_rates
WHERE dimension_name IS NULL
  AND metric_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
ORDER BY metric_date

charts.description: Average session duration by device type

query_context.sql:
SELECT
  device_type,
  AVG(session_duration_ms)/1000 as avg_duration_seconds,
  AVG(actions_count) as avg_actions,
  COUNT(*) as session_count
FROM session_metrics
GROUP BY device_type
ORDER BY avg_duration_seconds DESC

SELECT
  dimension_value as country,
  AVG(bounce_rate) as avg_bounce_rate
FROM bounce_rates
WHERE dimension_name = 'country'
GROUP BY dimension_value

metrics: SUM(CASE WHEN is_bounce = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)

query_context.sql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) as total_sessions,
  ROUND(AVG(session_duration_ms)/1000, 2) as avg_duration_sec,
  ROUND(AVG(actions_count), 2) as avg_actions_per_session,
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN is_bounce = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as bounce_rate_pct
FROM session_metrics

SELECT actions_count
FROM session_metrics
WHERE actions_count <= 50
LIMIT 10000
